Field description: Record type: 1=institution (school or college); 3=sixth form centre/consortium; 4=Local Authority; 5=National (all schools and  FE colleges); 7=National (state-funded schools and FE Colleges)
Alphabetic sorting index
Region code (see separate list of region and Local Authority codes)
Local Authority sort code within region
Local Authority code (see separate list of region and Local Authority codes)
Establishment number
(School /college) Unique Reference Number
Institution name of converter academy
Institution name
Institution address (1)
Institution address (2)
Institution address (3)
Institution town
Institution postcode
Institution telephone number
Contingency flag - institution results 'significantly affected'. This field is zero for all schools and colleges.
School type/FE college type
Religious denomination of school or college
Admissions policy (COMP='comprehensive', MOD='modern', SEL='selective', NA='not applicable', UK=unknown, BLANK='independent')
Gender of sixth form ('GIRLS', 'BOYS' or 'MIXED')
Indicates whether a school/college is a feeder institution for a sixth form centre/consortia (0=Not a feeder institution, 1 = feeder institution).
Age range
Closed institution flag (0=open; 1=closed)
Indicates whether institution is published in the primary school (key stage 2) performance tables (0=No; 1=Yes)
Indicates whether institution is published in the secondary school (key stage 4) performance tables (0=No; 1=Yes)
Indicates whether the school has checked its results (0=No; 1=Yes)
Dummy field

Number of students at the end of key stage 5 study

Number of full-time equivalent students at the end of academic study
Number of full-time equivalent students at the end of vocational study

Average point score per academic entry
Average point score per full-time equivalent vocational student
Average point score per vocational entry

Percentage of A level students achieving at least 2 A levels at A*-E
Percentage of A level students achieving at least 3 A levels at A*-E
Percentage of academic students achieving qualifications equivalent to at least 1 A level at A*-E
Percentage of academic students achieving qualifications equivalent to at least 2 A levels at A*-E
Percentage of academic students achieving qualifications equivalent to at least 3 A levels at A*-E
Percentage of vocational students achieving at least 1 substantial vocational qualification
Percentage of vocational students achieving at least 2 substantial vocational qualifications
Percentage of vocational students achieving at least 3 substantial vocational qualifications
Percentage of A level students achieving 3 A levels at grades AAB or higher (of which at least 2 are in facilitating subjects)
Average point score per A level entry expressed as a grade
Average point score per academic entry expressed as a grade
Average point score per vocational entry expressed as a grade
